name: get_mp3
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_mp3.
Tool description: Convert Youtube Videos to MP3
API description: Convert to MP3 at the default bit rate.
Quota cost will apply according to the length of the mp3 file.

is_id.description:
Quota cost will apply according to the length of the mp3 file.
Quota is calculated as follows:
if length <= 30 then 1
if 30 < length <= 60 then 2
if 60 < length <= 90 then 3
if 90 < length <= 120 then 4
if 120 < length <= 150 then 5
if 150 < length <= 180 then 6

cut.description:
Cut the mp3 according to the provided sStart and sEnd parameters
The value must be provided as 1
The quota Cost is +1.

sstart.description: The starting point for cutting the MP3. The format must be HH:MM:SS. Defaults to None.

send.description: The ending point for cutting the MP3. The format must be HH:MM:SS. Defaults to None.
